School Management System (PyQt/tkinter)
  • gui
  • gui_tk module
  • View page source

gui_tk module

class gui_tk.App[source]

Bases: Tk

Main application window for the School Management System. Inherits from the Tkinter main window class.

Parameters:

  • title (str) – Sets the window title to “School Management System”.

  • nb (ttk.Notebook) – A Notebook widget to hold different tabs for Students, Instructors, Courses, Registrations, and Search.

  • students_tab (ttk.Frame) – Frame for managing students.

  • instructors_tab (ttk.Frame) – Frame for managing instructors.

  • courses_tab (ttk.Frame) – Frame for managing courses.

  • reg_tab (ttk.Frame) – Frame for managing registrations.

  • search_tab (ttk.Frame) – Frame for searching records.

Returns:

None

add_course()[source]

Add a new course using the input fields.

Returns:

None

add_instructor()[source]

Add a new instructor using the input fields.

Returns:

None

add_student()[source]

Add a new student using the input fields.

Returns:

None

build_courses()[source]

Build the course management interface.

Parameters:

  • f (ttk.Frame) – The frame to hold the course management widgets.

  • top (ttk.Frame) – A frame to hold the input fields and buttons.

  • cid (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for course ID input.

  • cname (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for course name input.

  • cinstr (ttk.Combobox) – Combobox for selecting the instructor for the course.

  • course_tv (ttk.Treeview) – Treeview widget to display the list of courses.

Returns:

None

build_instructors()[source]

Build the instructor management interface.

Parameters:

  • f (ttk.Frame) – The frame to hold the instructor management widgets.

  • frm (ttk.Frame) – A frame to hold the input fields and buttons.

  • iid (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for instructor ID input.

  • iname (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for instructor name input.

  • iage (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for instructor age input.

  • iemail (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for instructor email input.

  • instructor_tv (ttk.Treeview) – Treeview widget to display the list of instructors.

Returns:

None

build_reg()[source]

Build the registration management interface. :param f: The frame to hold the registration management widgets. :type f: ttk.Frame :param top: A frame to hold the input fields and buttons. :type top: ttk.Frame :param reg_student: Combobox for selecting a student to register. :type reg_student: ttk.Combobox :param reg_course: Combobox for selecting a course to register the student in. :type reg_course: ttk.Combobox :param reg_tv: Treeview widget to display the list of registrations. :type reg_tv: ttk.Treeview

Returns:

None

build_search()[source]

Build the search interface.

Parameters:

  • f (ttk.Frame) – The frame to hold the search widgets.

  • top (ttk.Frame) – A frame to hold the search input field and button.

  • q (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for the search query input.

  • search_tv (ttk.Treeview) – Treeview widget to display the search results.

Returns:

None

build_students()[source]

Build the student management interface.

Parameters:

  • f (ttk.Frame) – The frame to hold the student management widgets.

  • frm (ttk.Frame) – A frame to hold the input fields and buttons.

  • sid (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for student ID input.

  • sname (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for student name input.

  • sage (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for student age input.

  • semail (tk.StringVar) – StringVar for student email input.

  • student_tv (ttk.Treeview) – Treeview widget to display the list of students.

Returns:

None

on_course_sel(e)[source]

Handle the event when a course is selected in the course Treeview.

Parameters:

  • e (tk.Event) – The event object.

  • sel (tuple) – The selected item in the Treeview.

  • v (tuple) – The values of the selected course item.

Returns:

None

on_instructor_sel(e)[source]

Handle the event when an instructor is selected in the instructor Treeview.

Parameters:

  • e (tk.Event) – The event object.

  • sel (tuple) – The selected item in the Treeview.

  • v (tuple) – The values of the selected instructor item.

Returns:

None

on_student_sel(e)[source]

Handle the event when a student is selected in the student Treeview. :param e: The event object. :type e: tk.Event :param sel: The selected item in the Treeview. :type sel: tuple :param v: The values of the selected student item. :type v: tuple

Returns:

None

refresh_all()[source]

Refresh all data displayed in the application, including students, instructors, courses, and registrations.

Returns:

None

Register a student for a course using the selected student and course.

None
